name: Manage This!
description:
OPEN IN HERE TO PLAY IN BROWSER

Manage this! Game about managing after storm situation. But wait, there is another on storm incoming. When and where it will happen.. Evacuate , repair roads and send ambulances to solve injuries.

* little bug (showing credits without clicking button)

TUTORIAL:

On the start of the round, you can choose if you want to invest more to medical sector or technical sector. If you invest more to medical sector you will have more ambulances, if you will invest more money to technical sectro, you will have more money to repiar your roads.

  When your round start, you can choose any city and you can assign work for vehicles: 

There are 3 types of vehicles: 

1. MEDIC  (also press A) : When you click to any city, it will send  ambulance to that city 

2 : Technic (S) : if you click to any problem on road, it will be repaired (if there is access, dark roads are not passable because of grav problems on road, which can be solved bz this vehicle )

3: EVACUATE(D); when you choose this vehicle and you will click to any connected city, there will start evacuation to given city (LATE STAGE OF GAME WHEN STORM CIRCLE IS DECREASING)

4: UNSELECT CITY (E or ESCAPE)

when city is selected, you can see how many ambulances it have in red and also how many technic cars (orange) and free medical space( between parentesis)

Credits:
